DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare three different way open woman 's cervix second-trimester surgical abortion . - Osmotic dilator : small rod , insert cervix , gently expand open cervix - Osmotic dilator plus mifepristone , medicine swallow - Osmotic dilator plus misoprostol , medicine place cheek gum Hypotheses : - add buccal misoprostol 3 hour preoperatively significantly improve dilation compare laminaria alone , make procedure faster , easy safer . - add oral mifepristone time laminaria placement confer similar benefit . - efficacy adjunctive misoprostol mifepristone influence gestational age , woman later gestation increase efficacy agent . - significantly patient receive adjunctive misoprostol mifepristone adequate initial dilation , few require manual dilation additional cervical preparation few complication arm , although complication rate low able detect relatively large difference . - patient prefer procedure do quickly possible little discomfort possible , cervical ripen adjunctive misoprostol associate cramp osmotic dilator alone mifepristone well tolerate may cause cramp side effect osmotic dilator alone .
DOC.criteria: 18 year older Able give inform consent Medically eligible outpatient second trimester pregnancy termination clinical site Englishspeaking Spanishspeaking site ability obtain informed consent Spanish Active bleeding ( > 1 pad/hour ) hemodynamically unstable enrollment Signs chorioamnionitis clinical infection enrollment Signs spontaneous labor cervical insufficiency enrollment Spontaneous intrauterine fetal demise Patient incarcerate Allergy mifepristone misoprostol Chronic steroid use adrenal insufficiency Porphyria Inflammatory bowel disease require treatment
